SEARCH
Module com.flashcardapp
Package com.flashcardapp.logic

Interface IAlgorithm

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicRotationalAlgorithm, SpacedRepetitionAlgorithm
public interface IAlgorithm
Interface for algorithms that manage the logic of study sessions using flashcards.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      void initialize(List<Flashcard> flashcards)
      Initializes the algorithm with a given list of flashcards.
      Parameters:
      flashcards - the list of flashcards to be used in the session.

    • recordResponse

      void recordResponse(Flashcard flashcard, boolean isCorrect)
      Records the user's response to a flashcard.
      Parameters:
      flashcard - the flashcard that was answered.
      isCorrect - true if the user's response was correct, false otherwise.

    • isSessionComplete

      boolean isSessionComplete()
      Checks if the study session has been completed.
      Returns:
      true if all cycles in the session are complete, false otherwise.

    • isFirstCard

      boolean isFirstCard()
      Checks if the current flashcard is the first in the deck.
      Returns:
      true if it is the first flashcard, false otherwise.

    • getCurrentFlashcard

      Flashcard getCurrentFlashcard()
      Retrieves the current flashcard being studied.
      Returns:
      the current flashcard.

    • getTotalCorrect

      int getTotalCorrect()
      Retrieves the total number of correct responses recorded in the session.
      Returns:
      the total number of correct responses.

    • getTotalIncorrect

      int getTotalIncorrect()
      Retrieves the total number of incorrect responses recorded in the session.
      Returns:
      the total number of incorrect responses.

    • getTotalCycles

      int getTotalCycles()
      Retrieves the total number of cycles completed in the session.
      Returns:
      the total number of completed cycles.

    • hasAnsweredThisCycle

      boolean hasAnsweredThisCycle(Flashcard flashcard)
      Checks if the current flashcard has been answered in this cycle.
      Parameters:
      flashcard - the flashcard to check.
      Returns:
      true if the flashcard has been answered, false otherwise.

    • resetSession

      void resetSession()
      Resets the session to start anew.

    • moveToNext

      boolean moveToNext()
      Moves to the next flashcard in the deck.
      Returns:
      true if successfully moved to the next card, false if it is the last card.

    • moveToPrevious

      boolean moveToPrevious()
      Moves to the previous flashcard in the deck.
      Returns:
      true if successfully moved to the previous card, false if it is the first card.

    • getMasteryLevel

      String getMasteryLevel(Flashcard card)
      Gets the mastery level of a specific flashcard.
      Parameters:
      card - the flashcard for which to get the mastery level.
      Returns:
      a string representing the mastery level.
